parts.text: {"word":"static","priority":"★★☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"静的な、固定された、変化のない","english_definition":"not moving, changing, or progressing.","examples":[{"sentence":"The economy has been static for the last few years.","translation":"経済はここ数年停滞している。"},{"sentence":"The price of oil remained static throughout the day.","translation":"原油価格は一日中変わらなかった。"},{"sentence":"The display was static, showing only a single image.","translation":"ディスプレイは静止しており、単一の画像のみを表示していた。"}],"collocations":["static electricity (静電気)","static image (静止画像)","static data (静的データ)","static analysis (静的解析)","static IP address (固定IPアドレス)","static friction (静止摩擦)","static website (静的ウェブサイト)"],"synonyms":["stationary","fixed","immobile","unchanging","constant","stable","inert"],"antonyms":["dynamic","moving","changing","variable","active"]},{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"(放送・無線通信の)雑音の多い、妨害された","english_definition":"(of radio or television transmission) having noise or interference.","examples":[{"sentence":"There was a lot of static on the radio.","translation":"ラジオにたくさんの雑音が入っていた。"},{"sentence":"The static made it difficult to hear the broadcast.","translation":"雑音のせいで放送が聞き取りにくかった。"}],"collocations":["static noise (静電気ノイズ)","static interference (静電気干渉)"],"synonyms":["interference","noise","distortion"],"antonyms":["clear","uninterrupted"]},{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"静電気、雑音","english_definition":"stationary atmospheric electricity; noise on a radio or television caused by electrical disturbances.","examples":[{"sentence":"The static in the air made my hair stand on end.","translation":"空気中の静電気で髪が逆立った。"},{"sentence":"I couldn't hear the news because of the static.","translation":"雑音のせいでニュースが聞こえなかった。"}],"collocations":["static cling (静電気によるまとわりつき)","build-up of static (静電気の蓄積)"],"synonyms":["electrical discharge","interference","noise"]},{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"(プログラミング)静的な、コンパイル時に決定される","english_definition":"(in programming) relating to aspects of a program that are fixed before or during compilation, not during execution.","examples":[{"sentence":"Static typing helps catch errors early in the development process.","translation":"静的型付けは、開発プロセスの初期段階でエラーを検出するのに役立つ。"},{"sentence":"Static variables retain their value throughout the program's execution.","translation":"静的変数は、プログラムの実行全体を通してその値を保持する。"}],"collocations":["static variable (静的変数)","static method (静的メソッド)","static typing (静的型付け)","static binding (静的束縛)","static memory allocation (静的メモリ割り当て)"],"synonyms":["compile-time"],"antonyms":["dynamic"]}],"etymology":{"value":"ギリシャ語の「statikos」（立っている、静止している）に由来し、「histanai」（立たせる）に関連する。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ˈstætɪk/","syllables":"stat-ic"},"inflection":{"notes":"形容詞と名詞で変化しない。"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**static**」は、主に「静的な」「変化のない」状態を表す言葉です。物理的な静止状態だけでなく、経済やデータなど、抽象的な概念にも使われます。放送や無線通信においては「雑音」を意味し、プログラミングにおいては「コンパイル時に決定される」という意味を持ちます。文脈によって意味が大きく異なるため、注意が必要です。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ The dynamic picture was very beautiful.","correct":"✓ The static picture was very beautiful.","note":"動かない絵を指す場合は「static picture」を使います。「dynamic」は動きのある、変化するものを指します。"},{"incorrect":"✗ The static electricity is dangerous.","correct":"✓ Static electricity can be annoying.","note":"静電気自体は通常危険ではありません。不快感を与えることはありますが、危険な状況を説明する場合は、より具体的な状況を記述する必要があります。"},{"incorrect":"✗ He is a very static person.","correct":"✓ He is a very reserved person. / ✓ He is not a very outgoing person.","note":"人の性格を表す場合、「static」は不自然です。「reserved」（控えめな）や「not outgoing」（社交的でない）など、より適切な言葉を選びましょう。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["statically (副詞: 静的に)","statics (名詞: 静力学)"],"idioms_phrases":["static cling (静電気によるまとわりつき)"],"priority":"★★☆"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B2","frequency_google_ngram":"比較的低頻度 (Relatively low frequency) - 専門用語や学術的な文脈でよく使われる。","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B2","text":"「**static**」は、主に「動かない」「変化しない」という意味で使われる単語です。経済や価格が「static（停滞している）」、画像が「static（静止している）」といったように使われます。また、ラジオやテレビの「雑音」を表すこともあります。プログラミングでは、「static variable（静的変数）」のように、プログラムの実行中に値が変わらないものを指します。日常会話よりも、専門的な文脈で使われることが多い単語です。","example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The population of the town has remained **static** for many years.","translation":"その町の人口は何年も変わっていない。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"変化のない"},{"sentence":"The **static** on the radio made it hard to hear the news.","translation":"ラジオの雑音でニュースが聞き取りにくかった。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"雑音"},{"sentence":"A **static** website displays the same content to every user.","translation":"静的ウェブサイトは、すべてのユーザーに同じコンテンツを表示する。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"静的な (プログラミング)"},{"sentence":"The company's profits have been **static** for the past quarter.","translation":"その会社の利益は、過去四半期の間、停滞している。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"静的な"},{"sentence":"She rubbed the balloon on her hair to create **static** electricity.","translation":"彼女は風船を髪にこすりつけて静電気を発生させた。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"静電気"}]}
